nodes.text: Galvan was a male Moff who served the resurgent Sith Empire during the Cold War against the Galactic Republic. Captain Lorant was a favorite of Galvan's by the time he was approaching retirement, and Lieutenant Pierce was confident that Lorant could manipulate Galvan into giving his team reinforcements.

Moff Galvan was susceptible to promotion of those who seduced him. He was mentioned by Pierce to be "more interested in Twi'leks these days", although that may have been a jab at Lorant, who he was coercing into seducing Galvan again in order to gain more manpower for a black ops assault on the Bastion.
